text: Andrzej of Sprowa Odrowąż was a 15th-century Polish noble and statesman, starost of Ruthenia and Voivode of Podolia. He is best known as the founder of the Bernardine Church in Lwów. Category:Polish nobility Category:Polish Roman Catholics Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Andrzej Category:Ruthenian nobility
title: Andrzej Odrowąż
